ygData.subject: Re: Out of the Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Grimmler:: Demise hits the ground and rolls out of the way of the blast, stumbling forward as he gets to his feet. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

::Demise/EndBringer/Scyther/Killfest/Greven/Incarcinator/Zardus,
Grimmler::

Demise hits the ground and rolls out of the way of the blast,
stumbling forward as he gets to his feet.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer jumps backwards, firing two missiles to detonate the
missiles heading for him. He growls, getting his balance and nearly
bumping into Double Punch unknowingly, though a message from Scyther
warns him of the danger. He spins around, lashing his tentacles out
behind him, electricity already running through them.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther watches EndBringer attack Double Punch, and turns his fire on
Injector, firing two charges at him. He still keeps an eye on Double
Punch, though.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Incarcinator avoids the three shots, firing two shells from his rifle
at Shockwave.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killfest jumps back out of the way of a sonic wave and a missile, his
jetpack launching him into the air. He fires two missiles at Vehement.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven growls. He hasn't been able to get any action at all this
battle so far. Turning his missile launchers upward, he fires two
missiles from each up at Unicron, four total.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus spins out of the way of the shots, firing two energy draining
missiles at Tuefel, the missiles glowing blue with a shield that would
deflect most laserfire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler sees Prowl gathering up the wounded, and decides to help out.
Spotting a bunch of stasis-locked Maximals (Alloran, which of your
chars are in stasis lock?), he flies over to them.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing the injured gathering begin, Kluster runs toward the same group
of Maximals that Grimmler was flying toward.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (The NDE does not have 60 characters.  It doesn't even have 30. 
Don't spread 
> propaganda, unless it's FOR me.
>      IR, I think the shots fired at Iron Raptor were just like a
missile from 
> Firestarter, who's in a space fighter form, as well as a dozen or so
rapid 
> laser blasts from him later on.  There was more, but I believe Prowl
blocked 
> 'em for you most of the time.
>      Also, Airly, don't know if you know this, Dark One and the
Oblitercons 
> ARE on the Alliance's side, and I think your Dragonfly character is
one of 
> the Preds allied with the Alliance, right?)
> 
> The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark
Claw/Nemesis
>
Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/
> Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Sun
Crusher/Reflector/Smokescreen/   
>   Serpentor:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Demon Wulf looked to his brethren and called loudly.  "The retreat
is at 
> hand, form my brothers, so we have the strength to leave swiftly!" 
He 
> slashed his sword as the missile was close enough, slicing it
neatly, the 
> explosion only lightly burning the blade and showering Demon Wulf
with 
> shrapnel.
> 
> He grunted in amusement as mech-fluid leaked down his face, neck,
and chest.  
> He raised his sword, the burnt blade launching off as a missile for
the 
> Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> Ten rapid optic blasts launched out from his optics towards Kali as
he drew 
> close to his brethren quickly.  "Coward?  I am the exact opposite."
he 
> laughed, Cybertronian mind games.  He would not lose his temper so
easily.
> 
> ---
> 
> Flesh Ripper had a hand gripping his face.  Well, the correct
wording would 
> be where a large portion of his face had been.  The animal flesh
covering his 
> robot frame had been ripped off and part of the metal plating torn. 
A 
> blood-like liquid went down his face in a large portion.
> 
> "Cybe...rtronian scum..." he raised his left arm, the palm open.  A
blue orb 
> of energy with the effect of an EMP blast shot out from his palm
down towards 
> Demise.
> 
> Flesh Ripper headed for his brethren.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark Claw avoided the mega blaster blast from Shivah, the Vok being
could 
> feel the heat from the near blast.  His frame rocked as another
blast struck 
> him, but he kept on, and in a blinding flash, Dark Wolf, the junior
exec. 
> gestalt on the planet, being twenty-five feet in height, landed on
the ground.
> 
> He was laughing the infamous "laugh" of a hyena.  He didn't stand
idle for 
> long, bringing up both of his arms in a defensive stance as he began
to walk 
> backwards quickly.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark One rolled over on the ground, firing off three blasts from his
rifle as 
> he rolled, none aimed so they all missed Dragonfly by several
yards.  He got 
> to Pyro and hoisted him up on his rifle as a shield and began minor
repairs.
> 
> "Breakdown, cover me!  I'll try to get this rustbucket back online!"
> 
> ---
> 
> Breakdown nodded to Dark One, and fired off five rapid optic blasts
at 
> Dragonfly's chest.
> 
> ---
> 
> Pyro was the least damage of the three remaining unconsciouss
Oblitercons.  
> The other two (Scavenger, Hiss) would need a long nap in the CR
chamber 
> before they were ready to fight again.
> 
> ---
> 
> First Aid was busy making quick patch and weld repairs on Hot Spot
to get him 
> back up again, and the robot gave Blades a quick glance, those two
being the 
> only Protectobots up and at it at the moment.
> 
> ---
> 
> Blades avoided a missile barely, the shock wave of its passing
shaking him 
> violently.  He flied straight nonetheless, and launched of twenty 
> highly-explosive 30mm rounds at Abominous' left arm.
> 
> ---
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer twitched.  With a few violent spasms and a scream
of pain, 
> he was back on his feet, his chest heaving in anger.  His boosters
in his 
> feet lifted him off into the air and he flew towards a certain
snake-bot who 
> wasn't suspecting anything.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scattershot looked down at Dragonfly.  "Didn't I say no one messes
with the 
> Alliance?  Yet you're still shooting...odd." he raised his rifle,
firing ten 
> armor-piercing rounds at Dragonfly's abdomen.
> 
> ---
> 
> Imprisoner felt his frame shake as missiles ripped into him.  "Me
thinks it 
> time to leave." he said, his turrets twisting, two missiles shooting
at 
> Endbringer, two more heading for the Cybertronian Fire, splitting
away from 
> each other, making it harder to hit them, both missiles being a
dozen yards 
> apart.
> 
> ---
> 
> Predator saw quite a bit of explosive firepower heading his way.  He
raised 
> his missile launcher, firing off two missiles that prematurely
exploded.  
> That took care of the incoming missiles, but there were still a
couple of 
> charges and plasma blasts.
> 
> He had squandered most of his time and jumped, three plasma blasts
tearing 
> into his right shoulder.  The explosions from the charges added onto
his jump 
> and he painfully landed on his damaged shoulder.
> 
> ---
> 
> Choran jumped out of the way of Charon's missiles, the explosions
rocking his 
> body, most shrapnel missing him.  He twisted around, several laser
blasts 
> beating on him and leaving large dents all over his torso.
> 
> "Now you're going to die..." he raised his rifle, wondering if there
was a 
> bounty on any of these people, and fired off twenty-five rapid laser
blasts 
> in an arc.  Five at Charon, five at Deepfear, five at Darkfate, and
ten at 
> the Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Still in momentum, Shockwave moves out of the way of two of the
charges, the 
> third exploding against his arm and digging a deep gash into his
right arm.
> 
> He raised his left arm, the laser cannon that was in the place of
his left 
> hand and forearm fired off three bolts of energy at Incarcinator.
> 
> ---
> 
> Firestarter did a basic barrel roll and avoided a spurt of autogun
fire from 
> the Element.  He armed his weapons and a plan formed in his mind
after seeing 
> how most of the attacks on the Cybertronian Fire had been
intercepted.
> 
> He flew towards the Cybertronian Fire, most autogun fire simply
bouncing off 
> his metallic frame, others digging in but not hitting anything
vital.
> 
> Being five yards away from the shield of the CF, Firestarter kept
his engines 
> ready to go full power.  He didn't want a missile beating him into
the 
> shields.
> 
> He armed his tubes, firing off two missiles at the CF from only
fifteen feet 
> away.  He didn't think they would be intercepted very easy.  He
peeled off, 
> not wanting to have his fuselage be struck with burning shrapnel.
> 
> ---
> 
> Unitron avoided the fusion blast, thanks to him never stopping his
flight, 
> from some Maximal but didn't have time to retaliate as he raised the
shield 
> still attached to his left forearm to block Dollon and Drillbit's 
> concentrated attack.  He was knocked back in the air a few feet, and
his 
> shield was  not doing all that great.
> 
> "Firestarter!  Get over here you clunker!" he yelled, raising his
laser rifle 
> and firing it three times, two blasts heading for Drillbit and a
single blast 
> heading for Dollon.
> 
> ---
> 
> The outline had disappeared, but Double Punch would regain it
quickly, much 
> faster.  He could hide.  He could run.  But still, Double Punch
wasn't out of 
> it.  He watched Beeline fire twenty-five optic blasts, only managing
to take 
> out three missiles.
> 
> Double Punch couldn't see his assailant but kept his optics in the
general 
> vicinity of where the robot had been.  He raised his left pincher,
firing off 
> two missiles at Zardus.  With the other pincher he launched off
another two 
> missiles, these seeking.
> 
> One travelled towards Killfest, the other headed for Darkfate.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector managed to avoid Alecto's shots by a few inches and raised
both 
> arms, firing two missiles from each.  Two at Alecto, the others
towards the 
> Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> The last two he had fired were fired at different angles and were
heading for 
> opposite ends of the Maximal craft, making it harder for them to be 
> intercepted.
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror did not have Injector's luck.  He flew hard and fast,
twenty-five 
> total laser blasts hitting his legs and ripping them apart pretty
bad, 
> mech-fluid leaking like a river.  He wasn't going to land, he knew
it would 
> hurt like the Pit.
> 
> He raised both arms, three ion disks launched from the left arm. 
Two at 
> Manthys, the other at Atilla.  The other arm fired off three ion
disks as 
> well, two at the CF and the other at Mantle.
> 
> ---
> 
> Smokescreen was about to pull the trigger when something large
struck him 
> from behind.
> 
> ---
> 
> Vehement's boosters were still active and as he saw a fusion blast
heading 
> for him he gave a sudden boost of power to them and avoided the
blast, in the 
> process dodging all the rapid laser fire and EMP blasts.  One
missile heading 
> for him was blown apart by Beeline the cyberbee.  The other struck
Vehement 
> in his unwounded side and ripped a large gash in a damaged area.
> 
> He clenched his jaw tightly until he heard a small cracking sound
and let the 
> tension loose.  He growled slightly, raising both arms and launching
off two 
> missiles from his left arm.  They spread out, one heading for Hot
Rod, the 
> other heading for the Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> He raised his other arm, an invisible sonic burst shooting out
towards 
> Killfest's legs.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector felt flames cover his body.  Fire did little against his
frame, 
> damage wise.  But it hurt like hell.  Reflector flew out of the
flames, 
> firing off a total of three missiles and three laser blasts and
letting out a 
> yell of anger mixed with pain.
> 
> Two missiles headed for Element's (gestalt) torso.  The other headed
for 
> Rixer.  The three laser blasts headed for Luzbel's torso.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher had tackled Smokescreen to the ground, in the process
knocking 
> the heavy laser rifle to the ground, which then fired a single time 
> harmlessly into the air.
> 
> The Brotherhood robot rolled along with Smokescreen.  He had a few
feet on 
> him and had him pinned and unarmed.  He began to punch Smokescreen
in the 
> face repeatedly, snickering at the stupidity of the Warrior of
Light.  "No 
> heathen will kill the Archbishop on my watch, heathen."
> 
> ---
> 
> Scattershot was hit from behind and was flying through the air
uncontrolably, 
> heading for the CF's shields.
